title: Riven!
body: What {{champion:92}}  skin do you think I should get?

replies.body:
arcade and dragonblade have good animations but battle bunny is the smoothest

championship i think will be out this year sometime, but im pretty sure its actually clunky as hell

^ 

I also agree with BurningAvalanche. Arcade Riven has great animations, but Battle Bunny Riven is a pretty iconic skin.
Dragonblade lol. Good luck getting it. Jokes aside get Arcade Riven or Battle Bunny. Whichever you think looks cooler. I have Arcade and it looks pretty nice. Got it from Hextech Crafting woohoo.
